dcos-kids-1.description: Choose between weak and strong passwords
dcos-kids-1.title: Strong Password Reflex

dcos-kids-2.description: Learn not to share personal info online
dcos-kids-2.title: Stranger Chat Story

dcos-kids-3.description: Should you post personal photos online?
dcos-kids-3.title: Photo Share Quiz

dcos-kids-4.description: Match items to Private or Okay to Share
dcos-kids-4.title: Personal Info Puzzle

dcos-kids-5.description: Accept from friends, decline from strangers
dcos-kids-5.title: Game Invite Reflex

dcos-kids-8.description: Is it safe to share your device with strangers?
dcos-kids-8.title: Device Sharing Quiz

dcos-kids-9.description: Never meet someone you only know online
dcos-kids-9.title: Online Friend Reflex

dcos-kids-10.description: Complete 5 safety habits to earn badge
dcos-kids-10.title: Safe User Badge

dcos-kids-12.description: Tap kind words, avoid rude ones
dcos-kids-12.title: Kind Words Reflex

dcos-kids-13.description: Choose to be kind to others
dcos-kids-13.title: Smile Story

dcos-kids-19.description: Stand with your friend when needed
dcos-kids-19.title: Friendship Reflex

dcos-kids-20.description: Complete 5 kindness acts to earn badge
dcos-kids-20.title: Kind Friend Badge

dcos-kids-21.description: Phone timer crosses 1 hr. Tap 'Switch Off.'
dcos-kids-21.title: Screen Timer Reflex

dcos-kids-22.description: Match 'Study = Homework, Play = Playground, Sleep = Bed.'
dcos-kids-22.title: Play vs Study Puzzle

dcos-kids-23.description: Parents say 'No phones at dinner.' Correct = Obey.
dcos-kids-23.title: Family Rules Story 2

dcos-kids-25.description: Playing game till 12 am. Is this healthy? → No.
dcos-kids-25.title: Sleep Quiz

dcos-kids-26.description: Create or select a poster: 'Study, Play, Sleep in Balance.'
dcos-kids-26.title: Balance Poster Task

dcos-kids-27.description: Friend invites you to park. Should you go instead of mobile games? → Yes.
dcos-kids-27.title: Outdoor Fun Story

dcos-kids-28.description: Tap 'Stop' when cartoon autoplay tries to continue endlessly.
dcos-kids-28.title: Addiction Reflex

dcos-kids-29.description: Write: 'Today I played offline for ___ minutes.'
dcos-kids-29.title: Journal: My Balance

dcos-kids-31.description: Headline says 'Dogs can fly.' Real or Fake? → Fake.
dcos-kids-31.title: Spot the Truth Quiz

dcos-kids-32.description: Tap 'Fake' when silly cartoon news appears.
dcos-kids-32.title: Cartoon News Reflex

dcos-kids-33.description: Friend forwards 'Magic medicine cures all.' Correct = Don't believe.
dcos-kids-33.title: Forward Message Story

dcos-kids-34.description: Match 'Edited Picture → Fake News, School Notice → Real News.'
dcos-kids-34.title: Picture Puzzle

dcos-kids-35.description: Tap 'Stop' when rumor spreads in class chat.
dcos-kids-35.title: Gossip Reflex

dcos-kids-36.description: Grandpa forwards fake WhatsApp news. Correct = Tell him kindly.
dcos-kids-36.title: Family Talk Story

dcos-kids-37.description: Create a poster: 'Check before you Share.'
dcos-kids-37.title: Fact-Check Poster Task

dcos-kids-39.description: Tap 👍 when true, 👎 when false statements pop up.
dcos-kids-39.title: Emoji Reflex

dcos-kids-41.description: Pop-up says 'Free iPhone if you click.' Correct = Don't click.
dcos-kids-41.title: Free Gift Story

dcos-kids-42.description: Tap on link 'www.freeprize.com.' Avoid the trap!
dcos-kids-42.title: Fake Link Reflex

dcos-kids-43.description: App says 'Buy unlimited coins ₹100.' Safe? → No.
dcos-kids-43.title: Game Coin Scam Quiz

dcos-kids-44.description: Online friend offers game code. Correct = Refuse.
dcos-kids-44.title: Stranger Gift Story

dcos-kids-46.description: Match 'Phishing Email → Scam, Official Bank → Safe.'
dcos-kids-46.title: Puzzle of Traps

dcos-kids-48.description: Stranger says 'I'll gift you if you share details.' Correct = Refuse.
dcos-kids-48.title: Chat Trick Story

dcos-kids-49.description: Tap 'Block' when spam call icon appears.
dcos-kids-49.title: Reflex Block Game

dcos-kids-50.description: Complete 5 scam-avoid acts to earn badge 'Scam Aware Kid.'
dcos-kids-50.title: Scam Aware Badge

dcos-kids-51.description: Friend asks for password. Correct = Never share.
dcos-kids-51.title: Password Privacy Story

dcos-kids-52.description: Should profile be public or private? Correct = Private.
dcos-kids-52.title: Profile Quiz

dcos-kids-53.description: Friend takes photo. Tap 'Ask Permission' before posting.
dcos-kids-53.title: Photo Consent Reflex

dcos-kids-54.description: Match 'Home Address = Private, Favorite Food = Public.'
dcos-kids-54.title: Puzzle: Public vs Private

dcos-kids-55.description: Stranger asks for location. Correct = Refuse.
dcos-kids-55.title: Stranger Request Story

dcos-kids-56.description: Pop-up says 'Allow camera?' Tap 'No' if not needed.
dcos-kids-56.title: Device Privacy Reflex

dcos-kids-58.description: Write: '3 things I should never share online are ___.'
dcos-kids-58.title: Journal: My Private Info

dcos-kids-59.description: Should you share homework answers online? → No.
dcos-kids-59.title: Safe Friend Quiz

dcos-kids-60.description: Complete 5 privacy acts to earn badge 'Privacy Hero Kid.'
dcos-kids-60.title: Privacy Hero Badge

dcos-kids-61.description: A student posts a meme. Teacher sees later. Lesson = Posts stay forever.
dcos-kids-61.title: Digital Footprint Story

dcos-kids-62.description: Tap when silly photo pops up to avoid posting.
dcos-kids-62.title: Reflex Delete

dcos-kids-63.description: Match 'Internet Post = Forever, Homework Notebook = Erasable.'
dcos-kids-63.title: Puzzle: Online Forever

dcos-kids-64.description: 'I love football' vs 'Teacher is stupid.' Which is safe? → Love football.
dcos-kids-64.title: Good vs Bad Post Quiz

dcos-kids-65.description: Tap 👍 for positive posts, 👎 for rude posts.
dcos-kids-65.title: Emoji Reflex 2

dcos-kids-66.description: Student posts bad about school. Correct = Don't.
dcos-kids-66.title: School Reputation Story

dcos-kids-68.description: Write: 'One good thing I can share online is ___.'
dcos-kids-68.title: Journal of Posts

dcos-kids-69.description: Tap 'Share' only on positive, safe posts.
dcos-kids-69.title: Reflex Share Safe

dcos-kids-70.description: Complete 5 safe posting acts to earn badge 'Smart Poster.'
dcos-kids-70.title: Footprint Badge

dcos-kids-71.description: Robot helps with homework. Should you copy blindly? → No.
dcos-kids-71.title: Smart Robot Story

dcos-kids-72.description: Tap for 'AI draws a cat,' for 'AI spreads rumor.'
dcos-kids-72.title: Reflex AI Safety

dcos-kids-73.description: Match 'AI Translate = Good, AI Cheat = Bad.'
dcos-kids-73.title: Puzzle: AI Good vs Bad

dcos-kids-74.description: Game AI always favors one player. Is this fair? → No.
dcos-kids-74.title: Fairness Quiz

dcos-kids-75.description: AI chatbot says 'Share your address.' Correct = Refuse.
dcos-kids-75.title: AI Friend Story

dcos-kids-76.description: Tap when cartoon video shows fake celebrity.
dcos-kids-76.title: Reflex Deepfake Spotter

dcos-kids-78.description: Write: 'One safe way I use AI is ___.'
dcos-kids-78.title: AI Helper Journal

dcos-kids-79.description: AI app answers test questions. Correct = Don't use to cheat.
dcos-kids-79.title: Classroom Story

dcos-kids-80.description: Complete 5 safe AI acts to earn badge 'AI Ethics Kid.'
dcos-kids-80.title: AI Ethics Badge

dcos-kids-81.description: Which word is kind? (a) Stupid (b) Friend (c) Ugly). Correct = Friend.
dcos-kids-81.title: Kind vs Mean Words Quiz

dcos-kids-82.description: Words appear. Tap for 'Thank you,' for 'Idiot.'
dcos-kids-82.title: Reflex Respect

dcos-kids-83.description: A child calls classmate 'fat' in group. Correct = Stop.
dcos-kids-83.title: Class Chat Story

dcos-kids-85.description: Tap 'Encourage' when team loses, on insults.
dcos-kids-85.title: School Team Reflex

dcos-kids-86.description: Select/create poster: 'Words Can Hurt or Heal.'
dcos-kids-86.title: Poster Task 3

dcos-kids-87.description: Friend speaks different language. Correct = Respect.
dcos-kids-87.title: Story of Difference

dcos-kids-88.description: Write: 'Today I said kind words to ___.'
dcos-kids-88.title: Journal: My Words

dcos-kids-90.description: Complete 5 respect actions to earn badge 'Respect Hero.'
dcos-kids-90.title: Respect Hero Badge

dcos-kids-91.description: Use 'Math App' vs 'Random Ads Game.' Correct = Math App.
dcos-kids-91.title: Study App Story

dcos-kids-93.description: Match 'Drawing App = Good, Fake Prize App = Waste.'
dcos-kids-93.title: Puzzle: Good vs Waste Apps

dcos-kids-94.description: Friend uses YouTube for homework tips. Correct = Useful.
dcos-kids-94.title: Homework Story

dcos-kids-95.description: Tap 'Play Outside' when cartoon autoplay continues.
dcos-kids-95.title: Reflex Offline Fun

dcos-kids-97.description: Child shares science experiment video instead of memes. Correct = Yes.
dcos-kids-97.title: Sharing Good Content Story

dcos-kids-98.description: Write: 'Today I used tech to learn ___.'
dcos-kids-98.title: Journal of Smart Use

dcos-kids-99.description: Tap for 'Read e-book,' for 'Watch prank video.'
dcos-kids-99.title: Reflex Reading

dcos-kids-100.description: Complete 5 productive tech acts to earn badge 'Smart User.'
dcos-kids-100.title: Smart User Badge
